languages.text:
"В танце смертельном кружились они средь ветров,
От морозных зубов ускользал{mf||а} хитрый эттфатер.
Завороженный охотой, метался призрачный волк,
Пока не развеян рукой был твердой Ульфара.

"Among the winds they whirled
in a dance of death,
The cunning Aett-Vater evading,
those front-fangs.
By the hunt spellbound,
the ghostly wolf darted to and fro,
Till Ulfar's firm hand
sent him scattering
across the snow.
languages.original_text:
"В танце смертельном кружились они средь ветров,

By the hunt spellbound,

languages.text:
「風の中で彼らは渦を巻き
死の舞いを披露した
狡猾なアエット＝ヴァテルは
前牙の猛攻を回避した
狩りに捕らわれた
亡霊のような狼は飛び回り
やがてウルファーの固い拳が
彼を雪の中へと
縦横無尽に突き飛ばした。
languages.original_text:
"Among the winds they whirled
in a dance of death,
The cunning Aett-Vater evading,
those front-fangs.
By the hunt spellbound,
the ghostly wolf darted to and fro,
Till Ulfar's firm hand
sent him scattering
across the snow.

traits.locale_text:
「風の中で彼らは渦を巻き
死の舞いを披露した
狡猾なアエット＝ヴァテルは
前牙の猛攻を回避した
狩りに捕らわれた
亡霊のような狼は飛び回り
やがてウルファーの固い拳が
彼を雪の中へと
縦横無尽に突き飛ばした。

languages.text:
“狼领以机敏的步伐，
躲避着寒霜的獠牙，
在风中追逐旋转，
如同一支死亡的舞蹈。
迷失于狩猎的狂热，
鬼魅一般的狼在雪中且进且退，
直到乌尔法强力的一击，
让他绝倒于皑皑雪地。”
languages.original_text:
"Among the winds they whirled
in a dance of death,
The cunning Aett-Vater evading,
those front-fangs.
By the hunt spellbound,
the ghostly wolf darted to and fro,
Till Ulfar's firm hand
sent him scattering
across the snow.

traits.locale_text:

躲避着寒霜的獠牙，
在风中追逐旋转，
如同一支死亡的舞蹈。

鬼魅一般的狼在雪中且进且退，
直到乌尔法强力的一击，
让他绝倒于皑皑雪地。”

languages.text:
« Une valse de mort ils dansèrent
parmi les vents déchaînés,
mais aux crocs avides
l'aett-vater ne cessait d'échapper.
Par la chasse envoûté,
le loup fantôme frappait et reculait,
jusqu'à ce que la main ferme d'Ulfar
lui fasse enfin
mordre la neige. »
languages.original_text:
"Among the winds they whirled
in a dance of death,
The cunning Aett-Vater evading,
those front-fangs.
By the hunt spellbound,
the ghostly wolf darted to and fro,
Till Ulfar's firm hand
sent him scattering
across the snow.

lui fasse enfin
mordre la neige. »

languages.text:
«En la tempestad trenzaban
en un baile letal,
{mf|el|la} Aett-Vater evadiendo con astucia,
los colmillos gélidos de la criatura.
Perdido en la cacería,
el lobo espectral como el rayo se movía,
hasta que la mano firme de Ulfar
lo hizo trastabillar
y sobre la nieve lo dejó tendido».
languages.original_text:
"Among the winds they whirled
in a dance of death,
The cunning Aett-Vater evading,
those front-fangs.
By the hunt spellbound,
the ghostly wolf darted to and fro,
Till Ulfar's firm hand
sent him scattering
across the snow.

languages.text:
"Unter den Winden wirbelten sie herum
in einem Tanz des Todes,
der listige Aett-Vater wich aus
den spitzen Zähnen.
Verzaubert von der Jagd
rannte der Geisterwolf hin und her,
bis Ulfars feste Hand
ihn durch den Schnee
rutschen ließ.
languages.original_text:
"Among the winds they whirled
in a dance of death,
The cunning Aett-Vater evading,
those front-fangs.
By the hunt spellbound,
the ghostly wolf darted to and fro,
Till Ulfar's firm hand
sent him scattering
across the snow.

languages.text:
"Ölüm dansı ederken
Rüzgârla birlikte gürlediler.
Öndeki dişleri es geçince
Sinsi Aett-Vater kaçıverdi.
Büyülü av, ürkütücü kurdu
İleri geri sürükledi.
Sonra Ulfar'ın sert eli
Güzelce yakaladı onu,
Karlara fırlattı.
languages.original_text:
"Among the winds they whirled
in a dance of death,
The cunning Aett-Vater evading,
those front-fangs.
By the hunt spellbound,
the ghostly wolf darted to and fro,
Till Ulfar's firm hand
sent him scattering
across the snow.

traits.locale_text:
"Rüzgârla birlikte gürlediler
ölümün dansını ettiler.
Sinsi Aett-Vater kaçıverdi,
öndeki dişlilerden.
Büyülü av sürükledi
ürkütücü kurdu ileri geri.
Ulfar'ın sert eli,
onu karlara doğru
fırlatana dek.
